hero.title: Professional Mobile Notary
hero.subtitle: I'm your mobile notary—fast, reliable, and you'll work directly with me. Available 7 days a week, early morning to late evening.

services.title: Notary Services That Come to You
services.subtitle: Whether it's a real estate closing, power of attorney, or documents for international use—I handle it all personally, by appointment.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting your documents notarized has never been easier. Three simple steps to get it done.

step1.title: Call or Book Online
step1.description: Contact me by phone, text, or use the online booking form. Tell me what documents you need notarized and your preferred location.

step2.title: I Come to You
step2.description: I'll confirm my availability and meet you at your chosen location—home, office, hospital, or anywhere in the Bay Area. Same-day service available.

step3.title: Sign & Done
step3.description: Present your ID, sign your documents in front of me, and you're finished. I accept cash, Venmo, and Zelle.

serviceAreas.title: Serving the Entire Bay Area
serviceAreas.subtitle: Mobile notary services throughout San Francisco, Oakland, San Jose, and all surrounding cities.

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Clients choose me for clear communication, punctuality, and a smooth signing experience.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: My notary services strictly adhere to the pricing guidelines established by the state of California and the National Notary Association.
pricing.standardDescription: Standard notarization fees per California guidelines
pricing.additionalDescription: When applicable, additional fees may include:

fees.travelDescription: Based on distance to your location

pricing.transparencyNote: I prioritize transparency and fairness in my pricing, ensuring a smooth and reliable notary experience for every client.
pricing.calculateSubtitle: Get an instant estimate based on your location
pricing.paymentNote: All fees are quoted upfront before your appointment. I accept cash, Venmo, and Zelle.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about mobile notary services

finalCta.title: Ready to Get Your Documents Notarized?
finalCta.subtitle: Skip the hassle of finding a notary office. I'll come to you—at your home, office, or anywhere in the Bay Area. I'll confirm my availability and meet you at your location.
finalCta.contactNote: You'll reach me directly. Text is usually the fastest way to reach me.
finalCta.formSubtitle: Fill out this quick form and I'll get back to you within 15 minutes during business hours.
finalCta.formDisclaimer: By submitting, you agree to receive a call or text at the number provided.
finalCta.successMessage: I'll call you back within 15 minutes to confirm your appointment.

footer.description: Owner-operated mobile notary serving the San Francisco Bay Area. You work directly with me for every appointment. Licensed and insured.
footer.certified: Licensed & Insured • NNA Certified Signing Agent

travelCalculator.title: Calculate Your Travel Fee
travelCalculator.subtitle: Get an instant estimate based on your current location

errors.notSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
errors.failed: Failed to calculate travel fee. Please try again.
errors.permissionDenied: Location access denied. Please enable location permissions.

included.title: What's included:
included.noParking: No need to find parking or travel

travelCalculator.privacyNote: Your location is only used to calculate the travel fee and is not stored.
